Generate high-quality, Anki-optimized flashcards for the topic 'SEC Cybersecurity Rule Compliance' (Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Penetration Testing And Ethical Hacking > Penetration Testing Types > 005_Compliance-Driven Testing Categories > Industry-Specific Compliance Testing > SEC Cybersecurity Rule Compliance). Use the provided research context (completed per voters: SEC rules effective Sept 5, 2023; Material Incidents via 8-K in 4 days; Annual 10-K disclosures on risk mgmt/strategy/governance; Pen testing relevance: validates risks, prevents incidents, informs disclosures. Sources: SEC.gov Release Nos. 33-11216; 34-97989 (July 26, 2023); NIST CSF for integration). Incorporate: - Learning Objectives: [INSERT FULL LIST FROM ABOVE] - Active Learning: [INSERT FULL LIST FROM ABOVE] (reference in explanations). - Scaffolding Layers: [INSERT FULL LIST FROM ABOVE] (tag each card). Follow Flashcard Schema exactly: Mix Basic, MCQ (with distractors per protocol), Application cards. Output ONLY a JSON array of 60 flashcards matching the schema. Ensure completeness, pedagogy, and voter priorities (e.g., no truncation, full relevance sections). Cards must be accurate, unbiased, and promote Bloom's progression.
